myabout: I am a full-stack developer with 3 years of experience. My goal is to work on large-scale projects, achieve great results in the field of software development, and become one of the leading developers in the region.
upwork: I have worked with several real clients on the Upwork platform and successfully completed multiple projects based on Django (Python).
